db:info.db:title: Qt Wayland Compositor Examples - QWindow Compositor

db:abstract.db:para: QWindow Compositor is an example that demonstrates how to write a Wayland compositor in C++.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += gui gui-private core-private waylandcompositor waylandcompositor-private
LIBS += -L ../../lib
HEADERS += \ window.h \ compositor.h
SOURCES += main.cpp \ window.cpp \ compositor.cpp
# to make QtWaylandCompositor/... style includes working without installing INCLUDEPATH += $$PWD/../../include
RESOURCES += qwindow-compositor.qrc
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/wayland/qwindow-compositor INSTALLS += target
